text:
October 9, 1952
Mr. James S. Miles
Executive Secretary
He: DUNN BALLOT of 10/6/52
Dear Jim:
I vote *ye®w on all except President^ Hooa,
Alliance College, and the Shod© Island Committee on
Educational TV. I vote •no* only because of lack of
information. With additional information, I feel sure
I would vote *yes* on at least one, and perhaps both.
I believe the Directors should be given additional
information on both.
Cordially,
Prank E. Schooley
Treasurer
FESifmh
cc: John Duim
